Name: Organizations Summary Page Header
Body: Find the Community Based, Faith Based, Volunteer, Government, Business organizations in your community, including schools,  offices, offices, parks, shops and shelters which contribute to its resilience

Name: Locations Summary Page Header
Body: Map places which are important to community resilience such as bridges, water storage tanks, assembly points and flood channels

Name: Activities Summary Page Header
Body: Track the events which are planned within your community that will help strengthen it in the face of disasters

Name: People Summary Page Header
Body: Identify the different groups of people who live in your community

Name: Evacuation Routes Summary Page Header
Body: Identify the roads and routes to get people to safety in case of certain emergencies

Name: Risks Summary Page Header
Body: View the environmental factors or situations which pose as dangers to your community
